text: List of replenishment ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary is a list of all replenishment ships of the British Royal Fleet Auxiliary. ==Active== ===Tankers=== Tide(II) class fast fleet tanker (2017) * * 'Tiderace' * 'Tidesurge' * 'Tideforce' Wave class fast fleet tanker (2003) * Wave Knight * Wave Ruler ===Replenishment Ships=== * Fort Victoria or Fort (II) class replenishment oiler (1994)
